summary: Medical Billing Specialist with experience in coding (ICD-9, ICD-10, CPT, HCPCS II), charge entry, denial resolution, and HIPAA compliance. Proficient in PrimeSUITE and Microsoft Office; strong administrative support and customer service skills in multi-specialty medical environments.
skills: Email and conference call communications with external clients
Reading medical documents (insurance forms, EOBs, procedure notes)
ICD-9, ICD-10, CPT, HCPCS II coding
Charge entry and submission of charges
Billing by insurance type (commercial, state/federal, private)

experience.title: Medical Billing Specialist
experience.description: Run daily report of charges ready to post for claims; understand CPT, HCPCS II, ICD-9, and ICD-10; re-code CPT codes; add modifiers; submit charges in RVU order following NCCI guidelines; coordinate with facility contacts via email and conference calls; inform contacts of nearing timely filing limits; use PrimeSUITE for charge entry; work with Insurance AR reps to resolve denials; knowledge of billing by insurance type; assigned additional diagnosis codes; accurate coding and posting; HIPAA compliance; administrative support; post charges, payments and adjustments.

experience.title: Imaging Specialist I
experience.description: Processed payments for medical offices, sorting and counting mail; prepared live check payments; scanned checks and correspondences; mailed out rejected payments; maintained client mail logs for monthly billing; quality checks on batches.

experience.title: Cashier
experience.description: Handled customer transactions and large cash amounts; assisted customers with product insurance and rewards programs; directed calls to correct department.

experience.title: Cashier
experience.description: Processed sales and returns; answered phones; offered insurance and rewards; directed customers to correct department; restocked items as needed.

experience.title: Cashier
experience.description: Processed sales and returns; greeted customers; handled cash; answered telephone inquiries; maintained store cleanliness and organization; restocked shelves.

education.degree: Associate in Healthcare Information Technology Management
